description.value:
Neuron models associated with:

Migliore R, Lupascu CA, Bologna LL, Romani A, Courcol J-D, Antonel S, et al. (2018) The physiological variability of channel density in hippocampal CA1 pyramidal cells and interneurons explored using a unified data-driven modeling workflow. PLoS Comput Biol 14(9): e1006423.

also see: 
 
- https://humanbrainproject.github.io/hbp-bsp-live-papers/2018/migliore_et_al_2018/migliore_et_al_2018.html
- https://senselab.med.yale.edu/modeldb/enterCode.cshtml?model=244688#tabs-1

title.value: Collection of hippocampal CA1 pyramidal cell and interneuron models from Migliore et al. 2018
